address: 579, Ground Floor, C Block AECS Layout, Kundalahalli, Brookefield, Bangalore
name: South House
dish_liked: Egg Biryani, Dum Ka Chicken, Roti, Butter Chicken, Fried Fish, Butter Naan, Mutton Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This place is next to my house and I thought of giving it a try for dinner. First thing you fall for is the decor and ambience of this place. The place has an antique look with lovely wallart and mirrors all around.

I started with pepper tomato rasam which is spicy n tangy. Great to try as a soup course.

From the starters, I tried baby corn sixer, mushroom kaju dry and paneer ghee roast. All of them were amazing and had indo Chinese taste with little andhra flavours. Spice level was OK unlike few other andhra places.

For the mains, I had veg mataka, nizami tarkari and kadai paneer. I liked veg mataka out of the three. It was like veg korma but more flavoursome.

I tried their paneer biryani which was amazing and u can try that if u like veg biryani.

It's a good place for a family dinner, office eatouts or hangout with friends.

Menu is slightly overpriced compared to other andhra places in the same area."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This heavenly looking place has come up in town with very lovely ambiance and super delicious food. I have been a lover for Andhra food and the chillies.

south house won't disappoint you. they are doing a wonderful job with food.
All the veg and non veg starters were good. we had babycorn gold, mushroom pepper dry, chicken 66, chicken sholay. in main course we haf butter chicken andhra style, nizami tarkari, kodi kura and breads. after that we had paneer, chicken dum biryani. loved the food.

hospitality was superb."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  We visited this Andhra restaurant last weekend and had a very good experience with the food and service. We had:
Chicken sixer - A spicy preparation of Chicken strips.
Fish pepper fry - Basa Fish fillets fried with a Pepper Masala.
Tandoori chicken - Tandoori Chicken cubes. A boneless variant.
Gobi curry leaf dry - A preparation of Gobi with Curry Leaves.
Mushroom Kaju Dry - This was one awesome dish that had Mushrooms and Kaju. Spicy and tasty.
For Main Course we had:
Dum ka murgh - A Spicy preparation of Murg which tasted good.
Matka chicken - A Malai preparation of succulent chicken cubes.
Kozhi chettinadu - This was a Chettinad style preparation of Chicken.
Paneer Biriyani and Red chilli boneless biriyani tasted good and was really filling.

foodnwine.in'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ordered Egg Biryani, Gobi Tikka and Gongura Mutton Biryani.

Gobi Tikka - moist and tasty marinade. Little on the salty side.
Egg Biryani - quite nice with enough spice
Mutton Biryani - superbly spiced, one of the better biryanis. Only gripe is that the Mutton is very chewy. Not good quality meat.

Quantity is generous.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  #update(2/5)
Chicken Biryani
very greasy/oily, reeked of coconut oil, 2big chicken pieces, ample amount of rice, even upon mixing well, biryani lacked flavor, rice is hard. food quality/taste is nowhere near to that of my first order.
restaurant let me down this time as i had better expectations based on my first order with them. cannot recommend as per current order.
(via zomato order)
packed in a plastic container. cold food.

#first order(4/5)
Red Chilli Chicken Biryani
Different from a typical biryani. Spice level is minimal though it has red chilli in the name.
Curry has very good flavor and pieces are soft. Rice is more like a pulao.
Ample quantity. Good dish to choose. Liked it a lot actually. Pic here doesnt do justice to the actual food :)
Do give this place a try.
(via zomato order)
packed in a foil pack. food remained hot.')]

Buttercream frosting is my favourite, and there arenÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¢Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x80Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x99t many places in Banglore for that.

address: 205, KHB Colony, 17th E Main, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
name: Shree Thali
dish_liked: Veg Thali, Paratha, Kadhi, Shrikhand, Buttermilk, Sweet Lassi, Bati Churma
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Daal baati dish is very good in taste. I love to eat here everytime. This is the place for those who want to eat these kind of dishes and miss home made food.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Eat away as much as you can ...if you dont have access to homely food on a daily basis...this is your next option... For 90 rs unlimited this is the best deal you can get...hot fulka chapatis with 2 sabjis (that vary on a daily basis) and Dal/kadhi (your choice) and sweet ...buttermilk, lassi and shrikhand are also available if you want

Although it's not a very fancy place in terms of ambience it is much better than a lot of messes that I have visited."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  A place for homely veg food where u get unlimited thali for very cheap.

Dal bhaati was a disappointment for me.

If u stay near by, running out of money and wish to have cheap homely food you can go and eat here everyday. It more of a mess kind of place.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's a North Indian mess, predominantly Rajasthani food. As the name suggest it provides thalis (that too unlimited) with a homely taste at very affordable price. They provide regular North Indian thalis, dal bati churma and parathas. This place quite popular among the bachelors living around the area. I have been to this place numerous times in past 3 years and taste have been consistently good. If you are looking for a quick homely lunch or dinner, this is the place. Only downside is the ambiance of the area. Though I don't expect a mess set up like this to have ambiance of a top notch restaurant but can keep the furnitures, walls and floor clean and tidy.

They have some of the best Parathas you will find in Bangalore."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Visited this place for lunch. Pretty good value for money. But i got a few chapathis/ rotis which were not cooked properly. And also, the rice was good, but after the 2nd serving, i felt like i got some different / bad quality rice...

Maybe it was just for me, but all in all, a good experience. A full tummy for a 100 bucks. Worth it.

Go if you want a full tummy but dont want to break your wallet.

- Abhishek Bhaskar.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Service is very quick and people are very polite. It's very clean and you get table quickly

Food is homely and if u go during monsoon u may get to try aamras which was as good as one prepared by your mother. Shrikhand is of good quality and quantity is so much that it can be shared by 2.

Also meals are unlimited including chapati.

Overall 5/5 for the amount we paid."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Very homely food. You get unlimited meals for 100 bucks that consists of Rotis spread with Desi ghee, one gravy subji, one dry subji, dal and Gujarati Kadi, rice, raita and curd. The food is extremely tasty inspite the ambience being a typical dhaba type where you squeeze in to sit down. Definitely worth 100 bucks. Very wholesome.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A place which is very easy to miss on a relatively quiet lane in Kormangala. They serve delicious Gujarati cuisine Thali. Rotis with 2 types of curry, raita, Gujarati style Dal, kadhi, rice and curd.
Chaas or lassi can be ordered additionally if you wish to.
Super quick and efficient service.

Quality of food - 5
Service - 5
Ambience - 3.5'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I am just wondering why I never seen this place before and people says itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s there from ages.

Tried regular vegetarian thali , great roasted ghee dal bati churma and delicious home made shre khand.
Food just blow my mind, itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s just a great home made food with lots of love.

Great service and I had such a lovely food after a ages.

Thanks for Shree thali for making us try some delicious stuff.'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Decent food. Though phulka are good. Cant complain if they provide such decent meal at Rs. 100. Ambience is not good. Restaurant is in on first floor of an independent house.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great Indian Unlimited Food @ Rs 100. A saviour for anyone looking for budget food place in Kormangala.
Highly recommended for everyone and a case study for Restaurants on how to satisfy customer needs and build your Business.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Unlimited thali for 100 rs(not 90 rs) available here. "Homely food" so don't expect too much tasty food here. Pulkas are nice. Check the updated menu. (2018 january)'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  In bangalore for only 90 rs full stamoch healthy food.
Really good. Sudh satvik food.

.......................................................'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Nice option to have budget food. Love the daal baati thali they serve. The unlimited option makes it even better option for the Sunday brunch. The veg thali can be better. But I think that's what you get in this price range in bangalore."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The place where you can get unlimited and good veg food at the price of just Rs 90. The food quality is also good here. One thing about the food that I don't like here is that they provide the same Kadi and Dal every time you came here. Secondly you will not get any choice. Everyday they change only one item from the menu. The place is like you go there, eat food and pay the bill and go out of this place. There is no ambience, so please don't treat this place for any kind of party or something. But the food is too good. I have been there twice and will surely go again."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Simple Authentic North Indian Food to be eaten till your heart is full.
What do you ask more for @ Rs 90.

???, ???? ????, ???, ????? ???, ????, ???? , ????,
???, ????? ??? ?????, ???? ?'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  A nice place if u want to eat typical "ghar ka khana". Food is good. What i liked is the cost and service with which they serve. Whenever u visit u must try their thali.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  A delightful small home. I wouldn't call it a restaurant. If you feel like eating ghar ka Khana and are tired of shopping and parking in Koramangala ; do visit this place. The Khadi-chawal is particularly good."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  USP : Rajasthani/Gujarati (Jain also) Food at an economical price.

You get an unlimited thali at Rs 90, and unlimited Dal Bati for 110.

Thali includes Phulkas, Rice, Dry Veg, Gravy Veg, Kadhi, Dal, Curd, Raita, Sweet and Frymes.

Along with Dal-Baati, you get kadhi, raita and sweet

Baati seemed fried rather than baked, but was soft and flavourful. Comes dipped in "Ghee" (its not vegetable oil since I could see the leftover ghee solidified in a few minutes). Kadhi is also pretty authentic, and the dal - though a bit diluted - will remind you of the north.

A lot of other outlets exist with thali system, but the taste and the variety for this price is unmatched.

They accept Cash and UPI transfer (he said BHIM app). You can order online via 'runnr' also.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Great homely north Indian food available at cheap price. Taste upto the mark and lot of variety available. Very small outlet but worth going and having food once a while.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

Unlimeted thali incudes:

Dal
Kadhi
Curd/raita (limited)
Phulkas
Rice
Sweet (limited)

Taste: 4/5
Hygiene: 4.5/5
Order time: 5/5

Must visit place!'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  If you are craving for homely north indian food then its the best place. Economical on pocket and thali which reminds you of your home food. Food here is of great quality and great taste. Don't think about ambiance while visiting this place as it is like a small mess. There phulkas are so soft. A must visit place for every north indians whoever likes simple home made food."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Used to be our hangout after college...Forget Om cafe or Gramin... You cant just stop eating those fluffy, hot and fresh rotis and the curry menu keeps changing which I love and last but not the least the "LASSI" and small glass of joy but you get way to dizzy after the lassi...still I wonder if its the food or the lassi that use to make me fall asleep during classes. I miss those days.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Awesone place to have delicious Rajasthani Style Daal Baati.... with great lassi..........
If you are a Daal Baati fan then you MUST go for it guys.... #DaalBaatLovers....!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Simple, no nonsense unlimited pure veg rajasthani thali. Place is small with 7-8 tables with 4 seats, first floor of a small building yet neat and clean. The hot phulkas served till you are full with good attentive service, one does not need to wait for anything other than the seat as place is crowd puller. For Rs. 90 with phulkas, rice, kadhi, curd, two vegetables, tasty daal, raita and one sweet ( buttermilk of lassi is charged extra) this is one good example of a running rasoi (kitchen) 7 days a week. The menu has lot of paratha items and daal baati too, will keep it for my next visit.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

The hot phulkas served till you are full with good attentive service, one does not need to wait for anything other than the seat as place is crowd puller. For Rs. 90 with phulkas, rice, kadhi, curd, two vegetables, tasty daal, raita and one sweet ( buttermilk of lassi is charged extra) this is one good example of a running rasoi (kitchen) 7 days a week. The menu has lot of paratha items and daal baati too, will keep it for my next visit.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Away from home? Bored of the commercial food/taste? Need some desi ghar ka khaana? Answer: Shree Thali.

90 Rs. For an unlimited thali/meal is light on pocket.

Highlight: hot phulkas with ghee

Unlimeted thali incudes:
2 veg: dry and gravy one each
Dal
Kadhi
Curd/raita (limited)
Phulkas
Rice
Sweet (limited)

Taste: 4/5
Hygiene: 4.5/5
Order time: 5/5
Value for money: 5/5

They also serve: Multigraing bati and parathas

Must visit place!'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  If you are craving for homely north indian food then its the best place. Economical on pocket and thali which reminds you of your home food. Food here is of great quality and great taste. Don't think about ambiance while visiting this place as it is like a small mess. There phulkas are so soft. A must visit place for every north indians whoever likes simple home made food."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Used to be our hangout after college...Forget Om cafe or Gramin...   Shree Thali is the best example for 'looks are deceptive' in restaurants category. A house in the first floor of a building converted into restaurant, this place surely does not instill apetite by the looks. But when the thali is served and start out... it is a different story altogether. Me and my wife are regular here, for the homely thali and tasty lassi. But once again I repeat, this place is not for people who are very particular about ambience"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Heard about the 80 bucks thali from a friend and decided to try it out with friends.

Located on the first floor of a small building, not exactly posh and not a conventional location for a restaurant.

The food,though, is delicious and perfect for those who miss home cooked food.

The thali consists of roti, dry sabji, gravy sabji, kadi, raita, curd and dal, along with a sweet.

Other items in the menu include paratha plates and extras such as lassi and butter milk.

Unlimited rotis and sabji at such a cheap price is a bonanza for the customers.

Don't expect great ambiance though the service is decent.

Great value for money, though wish for a greater variety in the menu."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Nice food it will remind all Gujaratis of their homes very pocket friendly and delicious food available not usually crowded neat and clean ambience just enjoy good home food here'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Visited this place quite a few times. For 80 rupees you can get a good satisfying meal here. The food gets you the feel of home made and the taste is very good too. Do try their lassi to round off your meal.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  It's a budget friendly hotel. They don't have many varieties, however offer good food in the options they have. I usually order the thali. They serve freshly made hot phulkas which is good. The menu for subzi changes everyday. I somehow manage to finish the thali completely at this place, because usually I cannot finish the whole thali. It's kinda regular lunch place for me as it's quite near to my office ."), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED

  Wow, this place is pretty amazing. For 80 bucks you get to eat as much as you want. It is a steal of a deal. The taste is good too. Do yourself a favour and don't expect the ambience to rock your world cause it wont. It is what it is. Economical and tasty unlimited food at its best. Best for office goers and bachelors but others can give it a try as well."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Decent ghar ka khaana is what can be found over here...
The place is a more or less like a mess... least expenditure is made on the seating and decors / interiors. Nevertheless there is no compromise on the food served, the quality and the hospitality... Unlimited food at the given price is really worth the deal!!
A normal person could have around 8-10 tawa rotis (though i could have around 14) meaning there is least soda in the food..making it even more healthy!!
Once a week, this place is recommended!!
Tip: The chilled lassi served is complete delight!! Many a times you may not even get it, as it is prepared in limited quantities!!'), ('Rated 2.5', 'RATED

  The best value for money unlimited Thali available in kormangala.
The place is a Rajasthani place and they serve paranthas,dal bhati and thali.
The dal bhati was not that great however the paranthas and thali are quite good.
The thali is unlimited and the waiters won't let your plate go empty. Before you finish the last roti there will be waiters ready to serve more.
They serve Roti's with and without ghee and you can chose accordingly.
The lassi is also good with very mild sweetness. Its quite thick and has kesar flavour.

  Shree thali is a cute little place for a quick evening bite if you are in a mood for a vegetarian allahadabi cuisine. Their roti subzees and the north indian thali are very tasty, filling and cheap. Especially their curd, such a thick fresh yummy curd you would ever taste. butter milk they offer is one of the best. Their sweet varieties are also good. The service is brisk with friendly young guys who serve with a smile. Ambience is average. The place is a tiny joint but since it is not that crowded it is manageable to sit and dine.

On the whole. I'll give it a 3.5/5 , a place you can go alone are with friends or if you find it difficult to dine then takeaway is also a good option.

  If you're hungry and want a wholesome meal with no nonsense, you need to visit this place.. Shree thali is placed a little off the main road on first floor.. The thaali consists of unlimited supply of roti, dry sabzi, gravy, daal, rice, kadi and salad.. This is accompanied by curds and a sweet too.. The service is awesome..   Basic, simple North Indian food. The place is clean and the service quick. Good value for money! Shred Thali is the kind of place to hop in for a quick dinner without putting a lot of stress on your wallet.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Went there this evening. Simple clean unassuming place near Anand Sweets in.a side lane on the first floor 5th block koramangala.

POPULARITY INDEX
At 10 30 pm only one table was vacant. VERY GOOD SIGN

AMBIENCE
Simple unassuming dhaba like place, plastic table and chairs. But airy with windows and not cramped like other dhabas

CLEANLINESS
Neat clean hygienic

SERVICE
Quick attentive friendly

FOOD
Had the unlimited thali.
Fresh hot phulkas, rice, dal, dahi curry, rajma, cabbage and carrot subzi, farsan, dahi, onion 2 pickles one mithai. Rajasthani style. Fresh flavorful, balanced spice, less oil healthy. Servers were generous with refills . All for the unbelievable price of rs 70. Are they running a business or doing community service. May krishna bless them with good karma.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Shree is a north indian mess kind of an eatery serving vegetarian thali and parathas.
The food is served fresh and hot. The unlimited thali decently priced at Rs.70 gives you 2 vegis, dal, curry (punjabi/gujrati/rajasthani), rice and freshly prepared chapatis - ALL unlimited, apart from curd and a sweet item.
Besides thali, they also serve hot stuffed parathas and baati.
Their baati is not to be missed - it is prepared and served in ghee which, such that it simply melts in the mouth.

If you are feeling homesick or missing home food and you happen to be in or around Koramangala, Shree is your destination for a fulfilling experience.

They also serve beverages like sweet lassi, buttermilk and cold drinks. They usually run out of sweet lassi - probably because of its demand.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Superb taste you can get. Place is clean. Service is prompt. Makes me feel as m eating home food. Best place to satisfy your tummy.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Good Veg Thali.. Should definitely give a try here.. Simple awesome food. :)'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED

  Went there this evening. Simple clean unassuming place near Anand Sweets in.a side lane on the first floor 5th block koramangala.

POPULARITY INDEX
At 10 30 pm only one table was vacant. VERY GOOD SIGN

AMBIENCE
Simple unassuming dhaba like place, plastic table and chairs. But airy with windows and not cramped like other dhabas

CLEANLINESS
Neat clean hygienic

SERVICE
Quick attentive friendly

FOOD
Had the unlimited thali.
Fresh hot phulkas, rice, dal, dahi curry, rajma, cabbage and carrot subzi, farsan, dahi, onion 2 pickles one mithai. Rajasthani style. Fresh flavorful, balanced spice, less oil healthy. Servers were generous with refills . All for the unbelievable price of rs 70. Are they running a business or doing community service. May krishna bless them with good karma.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Shree is a north indian mess kind of an eatery serving vegetarian thali and parathas.
The food is served fresh and hot. The unlimited thali decently priced at Rs.70 gives you 2 vegis, dal, curry (punjabi/gujrati/rajasthani), rice and freshly prepared chapatis - ALL unlimited, apart from curd and a sweet item.
Besides thali, they also serve hot stuffed parathas and baati.
Their baati is not to be missed - it is prepared and served in ghee which, such that it simply melts in the mouth.

If you are feeling homesick or missing home food and you happen to be in or around Koramangala, Shree is your destination for a fulfilling experience.

They also serve beverages like sweet lassi, buttermilk and cold drinks. They usually run out of sweet lassi - probably because of its demand.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Superb taste you can get. Place is clean. Service is prompt. Makes me feel as m eating home food. Best place to satisfy your tummy.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Good Veg Thali.. Should definitely give a try here.. Simple awesome food. :)'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

  value for money....home made food...unlimited thali just at 70'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  *******************************Awesome Food at and Affordable Price*****************************

HOME MADE FOOD AT HOME MADE PRICES.
OH My GOD!
This place is difficult to find unless you visit it once.
Very close to Yana Sizzlers, It serves proper thali's.
For 2 subji's and 4 fulka's + curd + Dal+ rice, they charge only 45 rs.
And mind you, the quality is impeccable.
They modify the thali for no extra cost. If you dont like a Sabji, they replace it with the other option.
Sprouts are always available here.
Good on nutrition. They also provide you with Home made pickle.
Kadi is worth a try.
No Music. Not needed when you have such good food on your table.
Getting place here would get troublesome as most of the north Indian's (actually everyone) choose to visit this place for dinner.
Who gets unlimited food for 65? and such good quality.

*******************************Awesome Food at and Affordable Price*****************************"), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  This is kind of a mess.Not much of an ambience to boast of. Simple plastic chairs and tables are there in 4 small rooms in a house turned into mess. And its not exactly a proper gujarati mess as people say.If you are craving for homemade food this is the place.
The food is simple and good and priced very less as you can see the menu.I have gone here a couple of times and like it. Service here is good and the people take orders and serve food very fast.
Kadi, aloo ki sabji, chana sabji, mixed vegetable sabji is really good in this place. You get really good phulkas and dal. The menu for the thali is not fixed and they serve something different every time. You have limited and unlimited thali both. The proportion of food for limited thali is quite generous too.
I go here whenever I don't want to have pg food and don't want to spend much.

Food-4/5
Ambience-2/5
Service-4/5"), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Tasty food is the right word for this place.. I have loved the quality they maintain to attract bachelors. I have liked their thali's cos thats the best here..

4 chapati's, Dal, rice, sabzi - sookhi, sabzi - ras wali. papad, salad and pickle
and how can i forget the KADI. Super yummy..

they charge 60 for a limited and 70 for unlimited.

You also have a choice to order the paranthas which are equally good.

The lassi isnt that great comparatively.
The place is inside a house with a lot of tables and chairs. It accommodates a lot of crowd at peak hours.

very efficient serving team..

worth the money. Food is very tasty here. An everyday paradise."), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED

  Pathetically dirty restaurant! A big regret why I came here! If there was negative ratings, I would have given that. Please don't do online order also."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  We went their in lunch time to have some Andhra Food. The service boys only understand local language and get impatient. For every query he was calling flr manager. Finally we ordered Mutton Biryani Hyderabadi style and fried prawns. Biryani tasted good but was nowhere near hyderabadi Biryani. It was cooked in Local style only. Prawns were super spicy as Andhra style and was delicious. Had ordered Butter milk and it was warm Butter milk tasted bad.  could not imagine butter milk to be warm.  Only pleasant thing   was, they serve food on Banana leaves only. If you are hungry and do not have any other option go there.

cookwithreena.wordpress.com')]

reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Once is a mistake, second is a blunder. There will be no third time that I am going to visit the branch in HSR. Horrible service and such a bad experience. Ice creams are supposed to make you feel happy, this place makes you regret your decision.
Other stores for Cream Stone are good, but this one - displays exceptionally low quality and service.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great place for ice cream. It is generally crowded in evenings and weekends. They have good collection of ice creams. 

Food - 5/5 (I have eaten almost all of their offerings and like them)
Ambiance - 3/5 (Not very comfortable sitting area)
Value for money - 5/5
Location - 5/5 (very near to the square)

Must have item - should try kala jamun, it is a new taste.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Cream stone in HSR layout has changed a lot. Ambience n look of the place. Coming to ice cream we ordered fruit fast diet stone concepts flavour with no added sugar wasn't tasting so good. Kind of disappointed. Place was not so clean as well."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Nothing great about this one. Lacks familiar hospitality like the one in KORAMANGALA 5th block. Staff are not well trained. Not sure if I will go over here again!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  All time favourite icecream place! Can never get bored of the Nuts Overload. :)

Food: 5/5
Service: 5/5
Staff: 5/5'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I tried tiramisu ice cream ?, it was simply yummy . Went today after lunch . Best ice cream spread at this place .Go with friends and have great time with great ice creams'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Cream Stone: Even flies can't stay away from it. 

The hygiene standards at this outlet of Cream Stone are poor, and I was surprised as to how other people were sitting casually and having their ice creams.

Chocolava

Bubble gum flavoured ice-cream had jujubes mixed with the bubble gum flavoured ice cream.
The place had lesser tables and was a bit smaller compared to other creamstone outlets I had visited.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Cream Stone serves perhaps one of the best icecreams in Bangalore. We were here after our lunch for some desert. Earlier my cousin brought some icecreams from this place at my home and I became a fan of cream stone. This time we were at the store to try some more icecreams. No doubt we loved the desserts once again but the management was really poor. It was hot inside and when I asked the staff to switch on the AC, he switched on the cooler. Management needs some improvement.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Located on the main HSR signal, u can't miss this place. It's a big outlet of Cream and Stone. Can park easily on the road itself and go enjoy ur dessert.
On a hot afternoon,while looking for something cold, we ended up here. Our usual at Cream and Stone is Willy Wonka, but here we tried Chocoholics. It's dark Chocolate Icecream with a few Chocolate Bars, fudge, ChocoChips, Cashews. It was good, but not as good as Willy Wonka. Nevertheless the service here was quick. Outlet is well maintained. Staff was friendly. There are a lot of dessert places in HSR, Cream n Stone stands out for it's competitive prices.")]

address: 15, Near Christ College, 7th Cross, S.G Palya Main Road, BTM, Bangalore
name: Sreeraj Lassi Bar
dish_liked: Faluda, Fruit Salad, Fruit Lassi
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Amazing place to eat deserts but it's a little costly.
Ice cream with jelly is a must try here!!!!
Also, do not try those "special" shakes, they are not worth it ..'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  My all time order here is the chocolate cone ice-cream and the delight ice-cream. They are truly a 20 rupee treat.
Their juices and shakes are also very good. Everything is fresh and served quickly. A place that serves refreshments is a place that is always welcome.')]

address: 2nd Floor, Forum Mall, Hosur Road, Koramangala 7th Block, Bangalore
name: Kalmane Koffees
dish_liked: Filter Coffee, Brownie Chocolate, Hot Chocolate, Hot Coffee, Chips, Cafe Mocha, Walnut Brownie
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  It was a Saturday evening that I visited this place. Ain't so crowded. I hadn't placed any order as I was waiting for my friend. So I started to read a book in the Cafe waiting.

The manager was arrogant enough to question me more than twice and told me that's its a peak time and I can't sit there without ordering for anything. Come on I do understand that it was weekend, but from the moment I entered the cafe four tables next to me were unoccupied.

I believe that any customer has a right and should be allowed to sit in a cafe waiting for a friend so they can have coffee together.

And I am not here to rate them on their product cause I was not allowed to. But I think a good Cafe is not made by good coffee(which they are known for and that's why I was there) but for the service they provide. How polite and friendly they are. And yes, the manager represents the brand. So they have to be polite. That's all I am trying convey."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Best coffee in the mall.
Service was quick. Ambiance is good.
Good flevers off coffee.
egg puff was not good.not crispy.
the coffee exallent.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  There are very few places which have delivered filter coffee experience consistently and kalmane is at the top . Authentic coffee with out any pretentious effort. They are not a coffee shop who serve tea too :). Try their blue grass for simplicity and madras filter to feel the richness of coffee and aroma . Without sugar is recommended. If you are coffee drinker your search ends here')]

address: 18/1C, Near Trinity Meadows, Bellandur Main Road, Bellandur, Bangalore
name: Zayakedar
dish_liked: Rajma, Fried Rice, Lassi, Butter Phulkas, Bhindi Fry, Thali, Butter Chicken
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Generally this place is crowded in lunch hour.
Food is awesome/tasty/hygienic.
Price is little bit high but it's affordable.
Though place is clumsy but you will find a place to adjust."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The best thing about Zayakedar is the homely North Indian food they provide with value for money. I have tasted their Chicken Kolhapuri, Chicken Kali mirchi, Chicken chilly, Chicken Pepper Fry and Paneer Chilly. They use very less masala and oil. This restaurant just reminds me of my college canteen.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Great food at great prices. Small outlet serving a variety of North Indian foods with good service. Have eaten here more than a dozen times and loved the food every single time . Their phulkas are always fresh and soft , Veg and Non veg dishes both taste yummy . Visit for some excellent North Indian food at reasonable price .')]

address: 405, 6th D Cross, Venkatpura, HSR, Bangalore
name: BIB - Breakfast in the Box
dish_liked: English Breakfast, Burgers, Sandwiches, Chicken Burger, Pasta, Veg Burger, Chicken Sausages
reviews_list: [('Rated 5.0', "RATED\n  At first glance, it's a tad on the expensive side. However, I got a 15% discount combined with an extra hundred rupees off on Swiggy, and got a brilliant breakfast for Rs 233; back bacon, pork sausages, chicken sausages, scrambled eggs, mash, baked beans, fried tomatoes, fried mushrooms, and buttered toast with some mango juice. Have to say, I haven't had back bacon this good at this price, and the overall meal was brilliant!")]

address: 73, Kamaraj Road, Commercial Street, Bangalore
name: Utse Kitchen
dish_liked: Momos, Thukpa, Noodles, Nepali Thali, Chicken Momo, Chilli Momo
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Had heard a lot about this place and hence decided to give it a try. Located in a little obscure locality, you would have to traverse the bylanes to get here. The ambience is very quiet and soothing and there weren't a lot of people on a Sunday for lunch. The food however was a little disappointing. I had expected more from the place and after reading the reviews. We ordered a Kathmandu Chilli momo, Mok Thuk, Lhasa mixed fried rice and Himalayan mutton curry and sadly none of the items were great. I would say the taste was very average. The mutton was so uncooked we couldn't chew a piece, however on mentioning it to the waiters, they waived it off the bill. The fried rice was good. It was the only item I liked. The good thing is that the prices are very very cheap. Can give it a try for the cheap prices"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  A beautiful place hidden in Bangalore central!! Loved the ambience.. so much positive vibes in there.. the food here is mostly tibetian, Himalayan n Nepali cuisines alongwith lil bit of Chinese. Tried their momos, thenthuk, Himalayan masala tea and butter tea.. totally in love with the food served here! Can't wait to try other food here. The staffs are humble and accommodative.."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Selected Utse Kitchen to feed our Tibetan food cravings on a Sunday evening. This place is a hidden gem near commercial Street. They serve amazinggg Tibetan food.

Service 5/5 : Two cute uncle and aunty were serving us.
Ambience 5/5: The whole place very tastefully done and you don't feel like you are in Bangalore at all.
Food 5/5: We ordered Kathmandu chilli chicken momo's, paneer steam momo's, veg thupka, fresh lime soda and honey and lemon tea. Everything was fantastic and the bill was just 600 Rs.

Having stayed in Dehradun for quite some time, we crave for that kind of Tibetan food here and are very happy we have found a place in blr which we would very frequently visit."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered a non-veg combo of egg noodles, chicken gravy and soup. At the price of less than Rs.200/- the quantity was too good, though i couldn't find a proper peice of chicken in the gravy (4-5 small shreds). But, taste was quite good."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Definitely the most unexpected and delightful experience for Tebatien and Nepali cusine. The location and this place might be a mismatch, but thats how I was surprised to see a place like that. In all honesty I love the Nepali Thakali, gave it a try and found it to be authentic in presentation but not in taste, and I couldn't blame them for it. As all the ingredients are sourced locally. I also loved the Momos and the tebitian meals.
I am definitely visiting this place again and again. You Give it a try too"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  On a Saturday afternoon, I went to this place ,with a lot of hunger and anxiety. I was really not sure how this place will be but seeing their traditional nepali cuisine i thought of giving it a try.
So there I was.
Started with their butter tea and some starters.
Congee crispy lamb, chicken momo.
Then in main course we ordered two fried rices and one chickem and black pepper lamb dish
The chicken was lemon and ginger chicken.
All the items were really nice and tasty. Quantity wise i am very happy and also service wise there is an uncle who is old but will take care of you like your parent.
In dessert we had some chocolate spring roll and that was just the cherry on top.
All in all this place really impressed me.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  We ordered Thai Red Curry, Paneer Psheling and Chilli Paneer. The chilli paneer was pretty bad with almost rubber like texture. The curries were better relatively.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Over of the very few Tibetian cuisine restaurant in Bangalore. Food is definitely one of it's keep selling point with its warm and welcoming ambience being the other. Service is good and the menu is quite elaborate to choose from. What makes it stand out is the pricing and the portion size. Having established that the food here tastes great, they are quite generous with their portions of serves and quite reasonable at INR 600 for two. However, as the restaurant as its located a little distance off commercial Street on a rather crowded street and the omission of valets could find parking a challenge.
Do try their Katmandu Chilli Momo, Chicken"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  The approach road is little dirty ..place is pretty well decorated and rich north eastern ambience.. service takes some time ..momos are good but the accompanying chutney was bad..Everest thali is quite good and filling but taste was not that great like what I had Nepali thali in Sikkim but overall a good experience.. chicken starters are decent..worth giving a try'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  What an amazing place. The ambience took me back to the Himalayas and of course they have wonderful food at a reasonable price point.
They have a twist on the thukpa and made it much more spicy to suit the Indian pallette. Loved the momos and the thukpa and the Himalayan Thali. The Nepali masala chai was also wonderful.
I was too full to try their Tibetan tea(hopefully made with salt like the original) so will be back to try more. Great place! Would love to meet the owners to have a word with thrm. Cheers :)')]

address: 12th Main Road Junction, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
name: Mama Mia!
dish_liked: Gelato, Strawberry Sundae, Hot Chocolate, Brownie, Wedges, Peri Peri Fries, Thick Shakes
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A amazing place for icecream

Got a large variety of icecream flavour

Tried the ice cream cake was good!!

Like it would surely recommend this place to others;!'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Not a big fan of gelato. I went for the ambience. Nice setup for a long chat. The gelato I ordered was kinda good. The fries were okay. I dont know why but Gelato does not excite me as much as Icecream does!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Mama mia was just 2 mins away from my hotel, and I visited this place everyday in my 4 day stay in Bangalore. This place offers some very exciting flavours of italian ice cream and very delicious ice cream cakes. Plus the menu is very tempting the sandwiches and snacks. Thick shakes are just perfect.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Ordered the Rocher Rocker Sundae and it was so good!!! My only complaint is that the whipped cream did not go well as a topping with the ice cream. Apart from that I was amazed and the quality and the quantity of the product. Many thanks.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We love this place for offering guilt free fat free desserts. What can one ask for. Great options of gelatos to choose from. Not quite heavy on the wallet. My favourite is the whisky flavoured choco gelato. The sundaes are worth a try. They have also introduced Nolen Gur de Bengale flavour which is to die for'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nice place for a quick desert. There was hardly anyone when we visited the outlet. We checked if they have any eggless options in their menu and the staff there said most of them contains egg. Later we understood this is a pure vegetarian place and everything here is eggless. So basically the staff in here are not very much equipped with knowledge on the products they have. Taste wise it was good but a little on th expensive side.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ordered a Belgian dark chocolate Sundae, was delivered promptly without the ice cream having melted. Decent taste & quality, with oodles of chocolate to satisfy my sweet cravings. Nothing exotic to write home about, not disappointed either.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This place being a dessert places serves your sweet tooth absolutely amazingly. This small cosy place has got a lot many new varieties of desserts. I have tried the death by chocolate and 1 serve can actually be more than enough for 2 people. I have also tried the brownie sizzler and both the desserts were just perfect. A must try for all dessert lovers.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Located on double road indiranagar, this outlet serves great desserts. Love their sundaes, especially the raspberry coulis topped vanilla icecream with crumbs. They have some interesting shakes.

They also have a wide range of scooped icecreams.

address: 8, 2nd Floor, Allied Grande Plaza, Diagonally Opposite Garuda Mall, Magrath Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
name: NoLimmits Lounge and Club
dish_liked: Salads, Chicken Bbq Wings, Sandwiches, Pasta, Biryani, Pizza, Popcorn
cuisines: Chinese, Continental, North Indian, Burger, Pizza
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  The disc space is amazing.
The DJ is nice especially on Saturday and Sunday that too with dhol
But the food is not so delicious
The white sauce pasta was bland
The red sauce pasta was sweet
The drinks are really expensive and highly overpriced'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Went on Saturday night as it was lohri special.
This club is quite famous. Found it great. Ambience was inordinate.
Food tasted good as well.
I ordered three pizzas and beer.
Tandoori chicken pizza, paneer pizza and BBQ chicken pizza among which tandoori pizza tasted Lil bland as compared to other two.
It was an upstanding experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I went to attend Christmas party organised by No Limmits. DJ & Live Band was good. Ambience is nice.
Food tastes good specially Chilly Paneer.
Staff is friendly.
Suggestion - Add more mocktail options please.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  We rely enjoyed our ladies night. We rely liked der service specialy sumon. He was always der to help us. Ambience was good. Der dance floor was awesome. We had a great party ovr der. Must visit place.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  The food tastes good. One should definitely try the Malai Chicken Tikka and Corn Cheese Sticks. The ambience is pretty average but they provide good service. Also you can play Pool here, they charge for it though.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Very nice place to hangout with your friends, Ambience was good but not satisfied with food , Service is also ok.....will give 4 stars just for the good time , I have'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Point to note- before 9pm couple entry is free but after that they charge Rs. 1000. Ambiance is all blue, if you like funky ambiance. Food is ok at best. It also has a DJ, but the music sucks. At least we went, the music was too loud. You have to literally scream to talk to friends. Even now my ears hurt just thinking about the setting.

Cos is too high. They charge service tax on top of state and central tax, which Is prohibited by the government. Over all decent place to hang around with friends but no value for money.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One place who have amazing food, hookah drinks and more importantly bollywoooooooooood songs on weekends i suppose. Also they accept zomato gold so what else do you need more? Go hangout in this amazing place and i am sure you will also agree with me.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Peaceful place. Not as great as the hype around it. The service was generous and quick. The place has good setup and the drinks are priced fine, overall a fine experience'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  'One fine HALLOWEEN'18 night @ this most amazing place .'

This place have some great indoor and outdoor ambience to make up to your visit.

The food , the dj , the live music _ everything was on point . Despite of the rush the service didn't lack anywhere . A quick and clean service is what every customer demands for , and they perfectly fulfilled the same.

The music is so good that you can't stop your feet dancing. Me and my friends had a gala time at thos place . Even there was live music the day we visited and that was also over the top performance . Every peny spent will be definately worth for.

Devashish Negi"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nolimmits, yes there is no limit for fun and good dance moves. The place is cozy and good crowd for a weekend hangout. The DJ was fantastic and it was all fun through the night. The food was decent and so were the cocktails. Good place for some dance moves and hangout with friends.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  NoLimits Lounge and Club, Brigade Road, Bangalore
.
Went on to this place on a Sunday night as they had Bollywood music being played.
Located on the 2nd floor, opposite to Garuda Mall, this place offers, dance floor, music, alcohol, hookah and yes, food.
.
We had the following here:
1. LIIT - great
2. Budweiser Magnum
3. Peri peri fries - Good
4. Cheese balls - good
5. Veg pizza - can do better
.
Though the food was good but service was too slow.
The Ambience sets up the party mode and the seating is really comfortable.
But be ready to scream if you are here for conversations.
.
This place is Recommended !
.
With Love
Thetechnifoodie'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  The ambience was nonexistent, looked like some shady bar in the indoor seating at least. We went there as out favourite band was playing but their sound system let us down. The food was also a disappointment, very bad. The waiters did not know anything about the items on the menu, at least what we asked.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This pub is very happening if the sole purpose is to dance and enjoy. It has one of the best dance floor setup and the music is too loud that you cant hear anything else. This place is to forget everything and dance.

We went their to celebrate one of our friend's birthday. We were awestruck by the ambience and lighting and all the setup. DJ started by 10 and then the environment was just phenomenal. Everyone was dancing and enjoying themselves.

The only flaw is the taste of their food. It was not that bad but its not that good to. We ordered many starters and none of them impressed me. So if you are planning to have food also then you might give a thought.

If food is not a concebt then you must visit this place if you like dancing and pubs. There are many events which keeps on organising every week and you can get free passes on many of the event organising apps."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

The food , the dj , the live music _ everything was on point . Despite of the rush the service didn't lack anywhere . A quick and clean service is what every customer demands for , and they perfectly fulfilled the same.

The music is so good that you can't stop your feet dancing. Me and my friends had a gala time at thos place . Even there was live music the day we visited and that was also over the top performance . Every peny spent will be definately worth for.

#notgonnavisitagain'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nolimmits lounge and club opposite to Barbuda mall is the right place to party on a Saturday night when you are around mg road .

Ambience - The place known for its desi style dj music and also for its very big space for dancing is pretty good for a weekend party. They have seperate spaces for dancing as well as just the party goers. They have pool table and also you can party as much as you want. They have seperate smoking area as well.

Food - We did not order much of food because we had already had eaten food and we just ordered paneer chilli and was good enough and we had just come to party here.

Drinks - We had black and white shots Smirnoff shots black label shots and many more shots.

Parking - Valet parking is available.

Food - 4/5
Service - 4/5
Ambience - 4/5
Price - 4/5.

Happy fooding.
#food #foodies #foodporn #foodallday #foodie #foodnight #foodgasm'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Drinks were not that strong ?. Music was really really good. Live music ?. Must go on Saturday night. Pan flavour hookah was mild but Brain freezer was good.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  No Limmits serves up some fine cocktails. The Long Island Iced Tea was bloody good and so was the Whisky Sour. Definite must-haves if you happen to visit. However, the Blue Lagoon cocktail was not up to the mark, and we felt it should have been avoided as an order.

Coming to the food, the Pepperoni Pizza is ace and even though it's slightly pricey the Non Veg Platter is a good bet. On the other hand, the Barbeque Chicken Pizza didn't come together at all as a pizza and was a major disappointment. When we raised a concern, it was replaced with the Non Veg Platter.

P.S. It helps to have a Zomato Gold membership as you will enjoy 2+2 on drinks with it"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A great dance floor with some amazing music and lighting. The ambiance is perfect to enjoy the dance and drinks. Quite surprised to find a place equipped with such a huge dance floor in a prime location . This is a boon for party goers since loud music and dance is banned across bangalore.
A great array of snacks to try. Mangalore chicken ghee roast, Chettinad chicken, , bbq chicken, Afghan chicken tikka, chilli chicken and cajun onion rings. Everything cooked nicely with brilliant flavours.

Heavily crowded on wednesday, friday and Saturday. So need to book the table in advance.

The service and the staff is good. They are courteous and well behaved. Prices are reasonable and value fo r money. Again cost and spending is an individual choice... This is not just a discotheque but a restaurant too.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

#food #foodies #foodporn #foodallday #foodie #foodnight #foodgasm'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Drinks were not that strong ?. Music was really really good. Live music ?. Must go on Saturday night. Pan flavour hookah was mild but Brain freezer was good.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  No Limmits serves up some fine cocktails. The Long Island Iced Tea was bloody good and so was the Whisky Sour. Definite must-haves if you happen to visit. However, the Blue Lagoon cocktail was not up to the mark, and we felt it should have been avoided as an order.

Coming to the food, the Pepperoni Pizza is ace and even though it's slightly pricey the Non Veg Platter is a good bet. On the other hand, the Barbeque Chicken Pizza didn't come together at all as a pizza and was a major disappointment. When we raised a concern, it was replaced with the Non Veg Platter.

P.S. It helps to have a Zomato Gold membership as you will enjoy 2+2 on drinks with it"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A great dance floor with some amazing music and lighting. The ambiance is perfect to enjoy the dance and drinks. Quite surprised to find a place equipped with such a huge dance floor in a prime location . This is a boon for party goers since loud music and dance is banned across bangalore.
A great array of snacks to try. Mangalore chicken ghee roast, Chettinad chicken, , bbq chicken, Afghan chicken tikka, chilli chicken and cajun onion rings. Everything cooked nicely with brilliant flavours.

Heavily crowded on wednesday, friday and Saturday. So need to book the table in advance.

The service and the staff is good. They are courteous and well behaved. Prices are reasonable and value fo r money. Again cost and spending is an individual choice... This is not just a discotheque but a restaurant too.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nolimmits lounge and club opposite to Barbuda mall is the right place to party on a Saturday night when you are around mg road .

Ambience - The place known for its desi style dj music and also for its very big space for dancing is pretty good for a weekend party. They have seperate spaces for dancing as well as just the party goers. They have pool table and also you can party as much as you want. They have seperate smoking area as well.

Food - We did not order much of food because we had already had eaten food and we just ordered paneer chilli and was good enough and we had just come to party here.

Drinks - We had black and white shots Smirnoff shots black label shots and many more shots.

Parking - Valet parking is available.

Food - 4/5
Service - 4/5
Ambience - 4/5
Price - 4/5.

Happy fooding.

address: 36/A1, Konappa Agrahara Vilage, Electronic City, Bangalore
name: Ruchi Sagar
dish_liked: Badam Milk, Masala Dosa, Filter Coffee, Pav Bhaji, Noodles, Idli, Chole Bhature
cuisines: South Indian, North Indian, Chinese, Juices
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Ruchi Sagar offers great prices for the quantity of food but even the lowest of prices cannot save the experience we had.

There isn't even one thing I can recommend.

We even went with different cuisines and nothing was close to enjoyable or edible. The dosas just tasted like oil. The masala filling wasn't seasoned properly. The Idli Chilly was just okay. It didn't taste good when delivered; maybe it might taste better at the restaurant. The Singapore Noodles weren't good. It, once again, tasted just like oil. The quantity is great for the price but one must wonder if you actually need this much quantity when it comes to bad food.

Possibly the only plus point was that the packaging was good and the food arrived on time.

It's difficult to say anything good about the Ruchi Sagar experience. There are many delivery restaurants nearby. It's best to stick with something else."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A pure veg south indian restaurant. Dining area at the first floor is available. service is good.i usually go there for breakfast.must try their idli, ghee roast dosa and coffee. they have chaats available as well in the evenings.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Breakfast For The Last Three Day's That I Spent At Bangalore Were From Ruchi Sagar.

They Have An Amazing Variety Of South Indian Delicacie's Including Rice Bath, Kesari Bath, Idly Manchurian Etc.

The Menu Include's:

1) Masala Dosa - Rs 43
2) Poori Kurma - Rs 43

Crispy Hot Masala Dosa With An Amazing Bhaji And A Dollop Of Butter (Due To Taking More Angle's Of The Dosa My Butter Melted Off ?) I'm Not A Fan As Such Of South Indian Breakfast's But At Time's I Do Love A Perfect Masala Dosa.

Now This Was An Amazing Dish, The Poori Kurma, Three Big Steaming Hot Poori's Served With Veg Korma And Sambar. This Is A Must Try Dish Here.

Place: ???
Service: Self
Food: ????
Value: ????
#thebighungrypanda #alwayshungry #zomato #foodnation #foodforsoul #breakfast #southindian #dosa #poori #delicious #hungryme #bangalore #foodisgood #bangalorediaries #foodreviews #foodphotography #foodblogger"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This is my first time from Ruchi Sagar. I have ordered butter naan and Channa masala. Taste wise it's good and quantity wise as well sufficient."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Well it's a good start up in the morning with delicious dosa, very fast service lots of variety of foods, lassi and milkshakes loved this place.")]

  Food was average...quickly served....poor ambience but first time ate a good karnataka meal. Mutton chops and Keema balls were well cooked and taste was hot and spicy. Will try more similar hotels after eating at gowduru. I am sure better versions would be available in Market. But worth a try.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Maybe tasteless screwups who crave for over priced food and meaningless ambience took this place down on ratings, but the key aspect one should look at in this kind of a place is the food and how it tastes. That's right, look at the actual element for once!!!
The food is heavenly and evenly spiced for a delightful meal. On top of that, the hot steamy spicy delights are served under 3 minutes of order. If that's not a cherry on top, I don't know what is."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  VERY BAD FOOD. We are regulars in the Indiranagar outlet and tried this one after moving to this locality. Not even half as good as the main branch.'), ('Rated 2.5', "RATED
  I've watched this restaurant's cooks come on some Kannada cooking shows and always felt kind of weird looking at them cook intestines and things like that.

My friend forced me to come here and eat and I wasn't really happy. The waiter thinks he's too smart. I asked him for another slice of onion and he told he'd give me a bag of it if I want. Hmm, very polite.

The biryani rice was fat and weird. It tasted very much like some masala rice with huge chunks of meat. Hated the chicken chops too.

I sat there, eating raitha and boiled egg. I don't think I'll ever be going back."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

  Good for a Karnataka home made taste. Try beegara oota (Thali) either mutton or chicken, you get sufficient amount of food. Meat, curry and quality is good and tasty too. Biryani given in the meal was not of great taste.
Tasted Brain fry, that tasted well too.
Not too many seats available. You may have to share the table during lunch time. Or you can take away. Overall one can try this place with no doubt
Will try some more delicacies next time.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ideal place to go if you are looking for home made nonveg food . Service good with reasonable price. Best to go for a breakfast on Sundays morning to have mutton varieties with soup. Frequent visitor to this place'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  This place is great if your looking for some home made food..
The food here is so authentic and value for money..when it comes to the menu they have kept it moderate with few dishes... the best part is the food is served in banana leaf ????'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Have been to this place twice and have tried different dishes each time. One the first visit I had tried the Gowdru Beegagra Mutton Oota, the food was spicy like it should be, the quantity was quite sufficient for the price and you can order  extra Chicken or mutton curry.

The Second, visit I had Chapati and Chicken curry and then shifted to chicken curry  and Ragi balls, I am not a big fan of Raagi Mudde, but I loved it here, the Gowdru style chicken curry compliments the mudde perfectly along with raw onions.

Ambience- 2.5/5 - This is a no frills type of restaurant, the prices are very reasonable,  the place is clean and hygienic
Service- 3/5 Small restaurant with a quick service
Food Quantity - 4/5 pretty reasonable for the price 
Food Taste- 3.5/5 I really liked the chicken curry and mutton curry was good too.

This is the kind of place where you go for lunch/Dinner on a regular basis, the food feels like home cooked.  Will visit again.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I visit this place rarely, but the first thing that I order is Kaal soup and idly with gravy. I visit this place with my brother, who orders the same and also include boti fry.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

  Ideal place to go if you are looking for home made nonveg food . Service good with reasonable price. Best to go for a breakfast on Sundays morning to have mutton varieties with soup. Frequent visitor to this place'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  This place is great if your looking for some home made food..
The food here is so authentic and value for money..when it comes to the menu they have kept it moderate with few dishes... the best part is the food is served in banana leaf ????'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Have been to this place twice and have tried different dishes each time. One the first visit I had tried the Gowdru Beegagra Mutton Oota, the food was spicy like it should be, the quantity was quite sufficient for the price and you can order  extra Chicken or mutton curry.

The Second, visit I had Chapati and Chicken curry and then shifted to chicken curry  and Ragi balls, I am not a big fan of Raagi Mudde, but I loved it here, the Gowdru style chicken curry compliments the mudde perfectly along with raw onions.

Ambience- 2.5/5 - This is a no frills type of restaurant, the prices are very reasonable,  the place is clean and hygienic
Service- 3/5 Small restaurant with a quick service
Food Quantity - 4/5 pretty reasonable for the price 
Food Taste- 3.5/5 I really liked the chicken curry and mutton curry was good too.

This is the kind of place where you go for lunch/Dinner on a regular basis, the food feels like home cooked.  Will visit again.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I visit this place rarely, but the first thing that I order is Kaal soup and idly with gravy. I visit this place with my brother, who orders the same and also include boti fry.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Good for a Karnataka home made taste. Try beegara oota (Thali) either mutton or chicken, you get sufficient amount of food. Meat, curry and quality is good and tasty too. Biryani given in the meal was not of great taste.
Tasted Brain fry, that tasted well too.
Not too many seats available. You may have to share the table during lunch time. Or you can take away. Overall one can try this place with no doubt
Will try some more delicacies next time.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  I've eaten here a couple of times. I usually get the 'beegru oota' which is a decent thali. I like the mudde mutton curry combination. Good chapatis that go with the thali. The staff are quick but not that friendly. Over all good place for a quick tasty gowda style non veg lunch."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Tried the food in tis restaurant not sure if it was bad timing or wat but the food was bad. We ordered for the mutton beegara oota which was ok not tat great coz i've had better meals of the same type. Boti fry was a disaster there was a stale smell not sure if it was not cleaned properly, when asked they said it was closing hours and it was cooked early in the morning tat cld be the reason which sounded lame. The only gud thing was the ragi ball. Wont be going to tis place again big strike out frm my list.

Ambiance : 3/5
Food : 2.5/5
Service : 3/5
VFM : 3/5"), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Visited this hotel couple of times on my friend's suggestion. The hotel is renovated around least year. The place is clean and has limited seating available.

We had mutton beegara oota(thali). Comes with ragi balls and biryani rice and very filling.
I liked the ragi mudde. Though made differently than what we make at home... This tasted good. Thick ragi paste with lots of oil. In andhra, we mix ragi powder in white rice for ragi mudde.
Can try this place for authentic Karnataka cuisine."), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Definitely a local food delight in Banaswadi...visited almost 5 times till now and lot of parcels done. This is one of place which will never disappoint you over food. My favorites are, Mutton kheema balls masala, mudde, Mutton chops masala, special boti fry, pepper chicken.....tastes just awesome and always full in lunch hours as it's next to sub-registrar office, Banaswadi.

Decent seating with dishes served on banana leaf."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  This is great place for local Karnataka Cuisine.

My favorites are Mutton chops, Mince Mutton balls & Nati Chicken Curry.

There are quite a few other items which are relished by most of the diners. To name a few their Biryani, Meals, Liver Fry etc.

Perfect place for a quick lunch as the service is fast. The food is on the spicier side so be ready for it. The place is normally crowded at lunch time but the wait is not long.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED

  Definitely try the ragi muddhe, or try their Mutton or Chicken Beegara Oota which come with muddhe too. The boti I didn't like. Looks like it wasn't cleaned well. The Chicken curry and fries are also quite tasty, so is the Mutton masala."), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  I went to this place after a friend's suggestion. Ordered their pepper chicken and Chicken 65 fry. Had a lot of expectations. But wasn't quite impressed with the food. The food tasted very normal. The pieces were very small and cut very unevenly. So, most of the pieces I had very mainly bones. I probably wouldn't go there again."), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Quite a fan of rustic fare, I am and I'm frequently on the lookout for such restaurants. I came with a friend who'd never eaten such food before and I was telling him about various places in BLR where they do a really good job.

The first plate arrived and the pieces of meat were as big as a cuboid made from SIM cards and all the meat in one dish could very easily fit into cigarette packet. 10's not 20's. The rest of the meal went downhill from there. Tasteless, no texture to speak of, lacking in salt etc It was lousy, to say the least and there was no point in ordering more. Might as well head somewhere else, which is what we did.")]

address: Ground Floor, EPIP Zone, Near BMTC Bus Depot, Whitefield, Bangalore
name: Bloomsbury's Global Kitchen & Bakehouse
dish_liked: Pizza, Cheesecake, Burgers, Pasta, Waffles, Chocolate Cake, Veg Burger
cuisines: American, Cafe, Continental, French, Burger, Mexican, Desserts, Pizza
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One of the best places I have been when it comes to the taste of food.

The starters and main course are delicious.

Loved the cheese garlic bread and pasta with flat noodles.

They have a great staff and a good seating area with a bit of British touch.

A must go place.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Had a great time last night here... Although veg options are a bit limited compared to non Veg ,the taste of ordered food is really good and a worth spend
Veg Tandoori sizzler was made again as the first one had mushrooms in it, really appreciate the team taking up the concern of our disliking to mushrooms and serving us a new one, however the cup of rice served with the platter was not that great in taste...
Ambiance is good for hangout'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Such a cute place with London sort of decor theme. It's a pretty big place. We only had tried the drinks and they were pretty good. Good place to hang out and chill."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  How did I not notice this place for so long!
Such a cozy cafe with wonderfully done interiors and a friendly staff! The food is amazing..the pizza, the sizzler and the amazing desserts. We especially loved a mango and mint beverage we tried and the pizza was yum :)'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  We went to Bloomsbury's on a Friday evening and something weird happened. The whole restaurant was vacant. Couldn't comprehend the reason.
Anyway, the food here is just so good. You can pick up anything and rest assured you'll have something lipsmacking. We tried the Kung Pao Chicken with Noodles, Solo Pollo Pizza, Chicken Wellington with potato mash, and number of mocktails.
Sans the slightly over-sweet drinks, everything else was really good and thoroughly enjoyable.
The decor of the place is slightly modern juxtaposed London themed. I couldn't really understand everything from the decor standpoint because it appeared somehow inconsistent. Specially the cieling lights.
All in all, we went there for good food at decent prices and that's exactly what we good. A good 4 stars. Awesome!"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Brilliant place to try out. Very nice ambience and their service is good. Both the pizza and pasta we ordered was awesome. Definitely going back again.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A place which I love for its Thai green curry, Southern cottage cheese pizza and Leak and mushroom soup. The place has an ambience of a London cafe and I usually visit this place when i want to have long conversations. It also caters a good spread of cakes and pastries. Staff and service is quick and polite! They use fresh ingredients which gives their food items a real fresh taste.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The place was good. We had Blueberry Cake, Red velvette cake, Aloo tikki twins burger, basket of fries. The Price is little high. Place is good and the service is good. Can try the Cakes and desserts. Burger can be even more better.

Ambience 4/5
Food 3/5
Service 4/5'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The decor is brilliant. Food is really good,lived upto my expectations. I ordered Basket of fries which was served with amazing garlic mayo. Fettuccini alfredo pasta, it was amazing 5 ??. For drinks I ordered Coffee vanilla and Strawberry banana shakes. The staff is very generous and well behaved.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Fraudulent practices by greedy fixers. The rating is totally fixed. They sell a cheesecake thatÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s basically Riches Non Dairy cream whipped and maybe they add a tablespoon of actual Cream Cheese into a kilo cake. They sell this fraudulent cheesecake for 180 bucks. It doesnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t even have real fruit on it but rather fruit crush jelly. Meanwhile a 5 star luxury hotel like the Taj West End sells an authentic cheesecake with real fruits and only real cream cheese for about 140 inclusive of taxes. The cheesecake here was nasty, had a chemical aftertaste and why not right? Riches Non Dairy cream is basically emulsified oil. Yuck! Whipped emulsified oil with Mapro jelly on top and this cafe gets a rating as high as it did. Clearly bought the ratings of theyÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92re feeding people who have never even had real cheesecake.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This is one place I was excited to try for a long long time. Finally got a chance to go there. The experience was amazing. As soon as you enter the restaurant, you get to see the vibrant ambience designed with major inspirations from UK.
We had high expectations from the food and it did not let us down.

We tried:
Blueberry cheese cake - Must order.
Bloomsbury's tikka masala(panner) - Must order.
Leeks and mushroom soup.
Masala paneer pops.
Chocolate gold cake.
Quesadilla.

I definitely recommend this restaurant. A must visit for anyone in Bangalore."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  How far can one push the boundaries? Where do you settle? Does one think of these questions when it comes to food? I never did, not until I tried Bloomsbury. There is good, there is better and then there is best.. And we think that's that. There's nothing beyond that. But level of expertise and the attention to detail that has been put to everything at Bloomsbury is bound to make you want to believe that there's better than best."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  It's a cute little place which takes you to England. It is beautifully set up.

  A boutique cafe and an artisan bakehouse, the theme is inspired from London. Conceived in 2011 in Abu Dhabi, primarily as a bakery, it has now spread its wings not only with multiple outlets in UAE but in India as well namely Bengaluru and Kochi.   Really amazing place to hangout with friends and family. Getting table during weekends is a bit tough so better book it prior. Overall amazing ambience and experience. Giving 4 only because of the delay.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  The first thing you notice about this place is it's ambience. With the theme worked around London, it straight away transports you to the British capital. Aesthetically done decor makes this one of the cafÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¨'s that a total Instagram worthy place (do it for the gram fam!).
Coming to the food, they specialise in cakes and I wasn't let down. Few of the must try one's are their Russian honey crunch, the golden chocolate cake, blueberry cheesecake and Pink vanilla.
They serve a lot of savoury options.
What I would recommend: Chicken Wellington, their thin crust pizza, nasi goreng , three squash blanket, chicken brushchetta and their huge burgers! There is so much to choose from here.
One more highlight here is the care and precision that goes into the presentation of the food.
Do visit this place!
Ambience 5/5
Taste 4/5
Service 4.5/5
Value for money 4/5"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

missfoodaficionado.wordpress.com'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Although they're famous for their cakes and desserts, I would highly recommend a few other items off the menu that I tried and loved like
Tom Kha Prawns soup, Chicken Tikka and Tomato Bruschetta, Mambo shake having banana,mango, peach. In desserts I loved the blueberry cheesecake and Russian honey nut choco cake.
The ambiance has symbols of British tea boutiques with kettles hanging off the ceiling and a red door for the telephone booth."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  To me this is by far the coolest place I have visited in whitefield. Cafe is located near Vydehi bus stop is adjacent to Galitos and Coldstone. Sticking with the london Theme, I am sure Bloomsburys has invested lot of time in thier interior designing. From cushions to their lightings everything had london touch. However food menu had no boundaries, we found many dishes around the world from british fish and chips, Thai green curry, Nasi Goreng, to Russian desserts. They also have bakery where you can order wide varieties of artisan cakes (Golden Chocolate personal fav). Listing out some of the must eatables :

MUST TRY :

*Tom Kha Prawns Soup
*Leeks and Mushrooms Soup
*Taco Salad
*Bang bang Prawns
*Arabic Spiced Chicken Pizza
*Mediterranean Spaghetti & Prawns
*Chicken Wellington
*Nasi Goreng
*Chocolate Gold Cake
*Russian Honey Crunch
*Blueberry Cheese Cake
*Irish Coffee

I highly recommend everyone to visit once and you will fall in love with this place :)'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  A truly British themed boutique restaurant and bakery which features dishes from across the globe. Loved the decor of the place. What attracts you the most when you enter is the assortment of cakes and each beating the other in terms of the icing and the designs. Went there for lunch and tried a lot of items:

1. Leeks and Mushroom Soup - Thick and tasty
2. Veg Bruschetta - Good
3. Taco Salad - tasty
4. Masala Paneer Pops - Must try
5. Southern Spiced Cottage Cheese Pizza - Drool worthy
6. Fettucini Con Funghi Pasta - Delectable
7. Trio in a Squash Blanket - Unique and love the flavors ; presentation is very classy

We tried the Rich Chocolate Marshamallow and Nutty Oreo'h mocktails which were a delight on a sunny summer afternoon. 

Desserts - You can't miss this one. Tried the  chocolate gold cake, Russian honey crunch and blueberry cheescake . My fav is the Chocolate Gold Cake which is rich and delicious. 

Service - Excellent"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Bloomsbury was something that happened extremely randomly. Me and my friend had just finished a movie and were looking to grab a light bite somewhere nearby. What struck us most was their ambience. It was incredibly nice. Since we were not very hungry, we went with my favourite mushroom soup so start with, which was creamy and perfect. We had their garlic bread for starters which turned out to be the show stealer. The choice of bread and the chutney that came along was just too good. It's definitely a must try. Finally, we finished the day with their coffee and vannila shake which again turned out to be a pleasant surprise as we got the taste of coffee, vannila and honey separately :)

I'd love to come back here for a full fledged meal sometime very soon!"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This one is the most popular cafe arround Whitefield. The inside theme of the cafe is London. Liked the place , pretty cool for casual hangout.
Ordered pizza - 3 bird alferdo and in starters chicken slider .
It was very good.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  One of the Gorgeous Outlets and Photo friendly places..!!
Just loved the Britain style More grey-ish and Merry so- early morning type of fresh place..!!
Some of the seating is so gorgeous and i couldn't stop clickin 'em..!!
I was here for breakfast and tried few items in their Breakfast Menu..!!
Started with their Hot chocolate and totally loved it..!!
Then Mac n Cheese wasn't really upto the mark but decent..!!
Mushroom Fettuccine was a wow - A thumbs Up
This One dish I loved most - Trio in Squash Basket - Classic Arabic dish with Beet infused KUSKUS and Mushroom- Paneer- Wrapped in Zucchini and Herb Salad with Pesto And Red Sauce - WOW
Tried their Mushroom Soup was too thick but rich and not really creamy..!!Finally Loved their Waffle to Pancake..!!Couldn't try any desserts as I was too Full..!!Do Not Go for Chai ..!!
#SakhiRavoorDiaries

sakhiravoor.wordpress.com"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Bloomsbury is one of the beautiful cafes in Bangalore, home to amazing artisan bakery with the backdrop of British interiors will surely transport to the cafe you visit in Britain.
The menu is vast with dishes from almost all cuisine. The place is apt for brunch or late lunch.
Food :
Hot Chocolate: It was creamier and chocolaty just like the way i prefer.Blueberry Pancake: I felt it could have been better as it was too dry
Mac n cheese: one of my favorites that day, baked till perfection but lacked the extra cheese.
Fettuccini: It's a must try. 
Panner Paratha: It was too good especially with the achaar.
Nachos Salad: Perfectly dressed and huge quantity"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
