  Visited this london theme based cafe for Sunday brunch ...and absolutely loved it.
And here is my review:

???FOOD : Tried eggs Benedict, Irish coffee , cheese omlette (eggs done your way), pancakes, waffles, Mac n cheese ,parathas.

All these were too good and HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

Irish coffee was served in hot beverages , it had a layer of coffee and wipped cream - just divine!

Eggs Benedict ,Mac n cheese , cheese omlette were just perfect and quite filling.

Pancakes and waffles were also good , not too sweet , just the way I like it .

???? AMBIANCE : This cafe is London theme based , too spacious and beautiful .

???SERVICE & VALUE FOR MONEY : Service here is really good , staff members are quite humble and helping.
Food here is really good and absolutely worth the money. A must visit place ???.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Bloomsbury is a perfect place for your meal! Their breakfast and other meal options are simply great.
They have tried to incorporate tastes of the world and this you can try something from each cuisine.
The ambiance is like that of an English cafe with special London themes! The decor is nicely done and the seating is enough to accommodate 80 people. They have space on first floor which can be booked for parties and birthdays.
Coming to speak about food and drinks, my recommendation would be:-
??Irish coffee- This was a delight. Whipped cream on top with hot coffee with perfect taste, I fell in love with this!
??Chicken taco and taco salad are very good.
?? I really liked the parathas. Tried paneer and egg paratha.
?? Waffles and pancakes are also nice!
?? Eggs Benedict are also tasty. Egg lovers should try this out.
??Red velvet pastry was yummy as well.
Overall, I loved this place and will visit again to try other bakery items here.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

  After office I went this cafe yesterday.. The ambience is beautiful just like London based theme cafe..We have ordered 2 chicken dishes and 2 desserts..cakes were mouth watering..sweet lovers must go this place...we have ordered double red velvety chocolate cake and cookies and cream cup cake.. both of the cake are too yummy ? We have ordered also hot chicken tender.. Chicken was hot and crispy.. I loved it...Chicken welllington was different taste.. who like boiled chicken they might like this dish..as I don't like boiled chicken so I don't like the taste..good place for clicking pics and hangout also.. wide range of cakes are available here. I went this place for famous golden chocolate cake which was not available because of some issues..staff service also good and fast..will go once again for craving cakes.. overall I love this place and food..Must visit once.."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The theme of the cafe will surely give you London vibes. The cakes are mouth watering and also the ambience is really good and comfortable. We had Red velvet cake, Chinese 5 spice chicken , mambo shake and also fish o chips. The best we're Chinese 5 spice chicken and red velvet. Mambo shake was okay and it's quite heavy . While fish o chips had a monotonous taste.

Overall: 4/5
Food: 4/5
Ambience: 5/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The place is always a good relax one, which is located at heart of IT hub Bangalore i.e @ Whitefield. We can get many options of pastries ? , burgers ?, drinks ?, pastas, pizza ?, salads ? etc... I go very frequently to this place. The best option I like is crumbed burger ?. The chicken ? they provide is a good quality one and it is a fried one. They provide potato wedges with burger. It is a kind of meal feel we get. Service is good, ambience is soo good. Once again it is a nice place to relax ?. Thank you'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  By far the best desserts I have had in town. The cheesecake is a must try ? they also have the cutest ambience and very courteous staff. Loved every bit of the experience ?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A very vibrant cafe I must say.
They have given this place a complete British look and feel. They have two floors for seating. The courteous staff asked where we wanted to sit.
We had seats upstairs. Ordered blueberry cheesecake and its mouth watering and melts in Ur mouth??
Southern cottage cheese pizza was the next item on our table.... Loved the pizza as well coz it had this pure indian taste with paneer and sauces . The great combination of pizza topped with papad made it more unique.

The ambience is soothing...good to go?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The blueberry cheese cake was superb! The chocolate cake was tad bit dry.
I am in Bangalore since 2016 and finding a decent bakery has been a challenge. This was a good find.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A decent place near ITPL for sweet tooth people with aesthetically pleasing golden cakes . Good service.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Lovely ambience based on LondonÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s bloombury themed cafe. Loved the decor and the staff were courteous and warm. Service was good. We ordered double chocolate cup cake, chocolate gold cake and trio in a squash blanket. All were scrumptious specially the trio. One should definetly try this out its such a special dish specially for vegetarians.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Bloomsbury is located on the same lane as absolute barbecue and cafe coffee day. They have space in front of the Cafe for parking. The Ambience is nice and cozy, they do have one more floor but it was closed when we went.

We had one basket of fries and farmhouse pizza. The fries were not salted enough and the quantity was less. They served a rectangular pizza, quite a huge one with ample toppings, taste could have been better as it was bland.

Ambience : 4/5
Food : 3/5
Service : 4/5')]

address: 107, Praveen Transport Complex, Near ITPL Gate 3, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bangalore
name: Alpha - House of Biryani & Tandoor
dish_liked: Raita, Paneer Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Went to the place with my office colleagues for lunch and the place treated us well.
The place is inside a lane near ITPL back gate and easy to locate as it's very popular amongst those who work in and around ITPL.
The place is extremely good for non vegetarians as it has a wide variety of chicken dishes. They also serve fish and mutton.
We order chicken Tikka, babycorn 65, tandoori chicken,chicken biryani combo family pack and veg chicken. Amongst all the dishes tandoori chicken and chicken Tikka we're the best.
The family pack chicken combo comes with kebab which was also very delicious. The family pack chicken biryani combo is more than sufficient for four people and tasty too.
The service is also good and timely.
The ambience is ok. But when compared with food and price the ambience can be justified.
Overall my experience was good and would love to recommend it to anyone else.
Food - 4/5
Ambience - 3/5
Service - 4/5
Price - 3.5/5"), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  I have ordered Paneer Biryani couple of time from this restaurant. Earlier Paneer Biryani is too good from this restaurant. Now if you order Paneer Biryani from this restaurant you will Potato paneer biryani instead of paneer biryani, paneer quantity is very less and they put more tasteless potato in biryani. Now totally useless Paneer biryani. However, no doubt rice quality is too good I suggest you guys should change the name of paneer biryani to potato paneer biryani.

Review :
Taste (without potato) :5/5
Taste (with potato) :1/5
Quantity (considered paneer) :1/5
Quality :4/5
Delivery :5/5'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Worst Dinner Experience.

Its my fault, usually i will do research about the restaurant before check in. Alpha was a blind folded try only. I believe food taste and service are the both important aspect of food restaurant. Both are lacked here. No one attended me till the time i started shouted. No patrons in the restaurant i was sitting for more than 10 minutes no one is coming to me.

Talking about food I ordered Dum hyderbadi biriyani, biryani rice is okey but chicken is not cooked well. Still the flesh smell are there. It was disaster experience. 200 Rs is not worth for that biriyani.

Restrooms closed, wash base area also not hygiene.

Better donÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¢Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x80Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x99t step in this restaurant, seeing the exteriors'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The food which was delivered was awesome and the packaging was good and the rice was properly cook and chicken was juicy and soft the masala of chicken was tasty and perfect flavour of aroma was there in chicken Biryani.
Must try chilli Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ°Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x9fÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¥Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x9a egg.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Onion Kulcha.

Yeah, that's one item I have come to associate with this place, hidden in a bylane near the ITPL back-gate. They make some of the best Onion Kulchas in Whitefield. I like onion kulchas because they feel like a Butter Naan with a bit more substance.

They have revamped their outlet recently, and I tried it out yesterday for the umpteenth time. The depressing green walls have been replaced by a brighter decor. Service has improved as well.

Not only these aspects, but the food has improved as well. The quality of the chicken pieces in the main course dishes was much better than what I remember from my last visit. Chicken Bhuna is recommended. So is the Paneer Tikka Masala.

If you are working in Whitefield, this place is good for a weekday dinner.

Ambiance - 3/5
Service - 4/5
Food - 4/5
Value for Money - 5/5"), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Ordered chicken butter garlic fried rice (it was made non spicy as per the request) - it was OK, chicken pieces were chewy. Other dish was alpha boneless chicken biryani (chicken pieces were spicy, boryani was OK). Food was delivered late (rain can be a factor). Overall, it was OK types')]

address: 5M/406, Hennur Road, 2nd Block Extension, Kalyan Nagar, Bangalore
name: Sweet Truth
dish_liked: Chocolate Fantasy, Cheesecake, Chocolate Decadence, Chocolava
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Got my order completely wrong. I ordered the Pancakes (Pack of 6), 1 Cheesecake and the Hazelnut Brownies (Pack of 2). I instead got sent Pancakes (Pack of 3) and 2 cheesecakes.

The cheesecake was solid hard and was ice cold. Did not taste good.
The pancakes tasted good, but I only got sent 1 topping, which was the choco-fudge, whereas on the menu it says 3 toppings are provided.

Very disappointed with the service and the food.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  order was delivered an hour and half late no good service provided'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Chocolate descendant is just too good. Texture stays intact even after keeping in refrigerator. Perfect blend of chocolate and other ingredients. Loved it! Must try once in your lifetime :)'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Quantity is less for the price, brownie could be bigger for Rs. 109. Chocolate fantasy is good, worth a try for one time. Brownie's sweetness is perfect."), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Ordered cheesecake for second time.. Obviously means it was good when tried first. Second time the size was half the previous and the cake was in fully melted condition. Nothing to doubt the restaurant but delivery boy was suspicious the way he talked or responded. 16dec2018.. 8.45pm.may not order again. Just chk the pic below'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Pathetic doesn't deserve even a single star.. ordered and was waiting for delivery estimated time got over and nobody called. Later when I called nobody picked. Immediately received a call back from them stating that the item ordered is not in stock. I had ordered Cookie Crumble ice cream. They said only mango flavor available. Later after few minutes I was given another option of some chocolate ice cream. I simply had to accept that and waited for another half-hour for delivery. Completely disappoint with them on the very first order. Please order at your own risk!!!!"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Ordered walnut brownie. Arrived warm and fresh. Loved it. Will recommend trying it at least once. It was delivered very quick and that too way past midnight!'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  The food quality is very very bad had order Sabudana kheer (half KG) it was so terrible cont eat more than a spoonful. waste of money ,They need to change the chef at the earliest.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  I had ordered for red velvet cake for a birthday party from sweet truth! It was worst. Very disappointed with them. 1st thing the order delivery was late and also it was not worth the cost!! Totally disappointed.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered Chocolate Decadence , Cheese cake and chocolate fantasy cup cake from Sweet Truth.

Delivery was delayed by a hour and instead of having the deserts after lunch, I had to eat the same in the evening.

Chocolate Decadence cake is really nice, full of chocolate cream, really loved it.

Cheese Cake was little bit salty and I dint like it, offered to my friends even they didn't like it.

Chocolate Fantasy cup cake was good.

I feel they should fix the delivery issue and packing. It was really disappointing to see the packing."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  First things first, the packaging is so cute, everything was well presented. The cheesecake was good but the chocolate decadence was amazingg. The pancakes were okay, was too chewy for me.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  There's something about pancakes I find very comforting. And then there's Chocolate fantasy with a warm gooey centre. These were what I ordered from Sweet Truth, on a cold evening, to serve my sweet tooth craving (haha). 

These things cheer you up, and you don't even need to leave the comfort of your home! Delivered on time, and packaged well, I was happy with that bit. 

How coming to the food I had:

Pancakes: A set of three soft warm pancakes, served with blueberry syrup and chocolate sauce. Both the dippings were delectable. Had to choose between two at every bite. 

Chocolate fantasy: Soft, chocolatey cake on the outside, and a chocolate lava oozing out once you break into the center. 

I liked both the dishes, and would try out their cheesecakes and other dishes soon.

wordpress.com"), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I came to know about this place when Payal Mehta sent me link of this place under review program.

In starting I was spektical, as I never had good experience in sweets in my nearby area. Finally I gave order after couple of weeks.

And believe me the cakes were just awesome. Wish I knew about this place before. But better late than never. Thanks Payal for letting me know about this place.

I ordered 2 items under Review Program :

Cheese Cake - This item was like god. Damn tasty. Each bite made me wish that this cake should never get over. If you thinking to order this cake then you can order it blindly without second thought.

Chocolate Decadence - This cake is main for those who are fan of dark chocolates. This cake is made just for them. I am not a big fan of Dark Chocolates so I liked it average. I thought of giving some bites to my neighbour who is fan of dark chocolates and she totally liked it.

Overall experience was really awesome. Thumbs Up.'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  When you have a craving for something sweet, it's absolutely important that you order from the correct place. I am just glad that I stumbled across Sweet Truth on Zomato. If you have a thing for all things sweet, this restaurant will definitely feature at the top block of your list.

Had placed an order for Chocolate Fantasy and Cheesecake. The first thing that put a smile on my face was the neat packing. Most places, which deliver desserts and bakes are not able to stop the food from getting smudged while transportation, but Sweet Truth managed to do so because of their neat packaging.

Coming to the taste of these, it was just wow. Freshly prepared and all the flavours at the right place, the dessert was a much needed happiness for that day. Would like to order again very soon."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Supremely delicious cheesecake. Very soft, sweet on point and high quality. The chocolate cake was stunning. Beautiful and not overtly done. Very sizable portions. Simply wowed me...'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

Had placed an order for Chocolate Fantasy and Cheesecake. The first thing that put a smile on my face was the neat packing. Most places, which deliver desserts and bakes are not able to stop the food from getting smudged while transportation, but Sweet Truth managed to do so because of their neat packaging.

Coming to the taste of these, it was just wow. Freshly prepared and all the flavours at the right place, the dessert was a much needed happiness for that day. Would like to order again very soon."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Supremely delicious cheesecake. Very soft, sweet on point and high quality. The chocolate cake was stunning. Beautiful and not overtly done. Very sizable portions. Simply wowed me...'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Got to try this new dessert place out. It's been a very sweet experience to say the least. I tried their pan cakes and cheesecake, both of which were an absolute delight. Served warm, the pan cakes were soft and yummy. It came with blueberry jam and chocolate, who knew? They nailed the cheesecake. It couldn't have been any better. What can improve is their packaging. Packaging does create and impression. But none the less, a place worth trying for your sweet tooth."), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  I got to taste the cake from sweet truth thanks to Payal. They gave an opportunity to choose the flavors as well.
???

??? What I ate ???
? Chocolate decadence ??@ It was very good, tasted too good rich with chocolate and succulent.

? Cheesecake?? This was a delightful, very rich with Cheese, yogurt and very tasty.

? Chocolate fantasy ??This too was Chocolate rich, but wasn't that great when compared to the chocolate fantasy available elsewhere.

All in all good nice package of cakes and savoury are available. More prominence is given to the packing as well."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Received Chocolate Decadence and Cheesecake for review and the delivery was prompt. And the name intrigued me.

First things first, am not a chocolate fan. Not even by a long shot.
So why ask for Chocolate Decadence? My daughter. She likes chocolate (duh!) and loved the cake. Like literally licked it clean. Me, not so much but it doesn't really matter, does it!

Now, Cheesecake - I can gorge on slightly chilled cheesecake day in, day out. But I was a bit taken aback by the warm, almost salty taste.

Will look to try out more of their cakes."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Called for a couple of items. A chocolate decadence pastry and a cheesecake. Simple packing but efficient.
The pastry and cheesecake look very simple as compared to the dessert jazz we see these days. But when you take the first bite, you can feel the taste and quality. Brilliant. The chocolate decadence tasted brilliant. Soft, fresh and pure rich chocolate. With simple walnut topping. The cheesecake was also soft and fresh. Loved them both.
The look and feel of their products and even the menu seem very simple as compared to others. Prices are slightly higher according to me for simple pastries. Even the varieties seemed limited. But the quality and taste were great. Will surely try a couple more next time.
Would recommend :)'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  So many desert parlours opening up all around Bangalore and I wonder for how long they will be in business but Sweet truth is definitely here to stay. I was surprised to know that it's a only delivery eatery. They have a limited menu but we tried three of its desserts - cheesecake, chocolate fantasy and choco lava cake.

The choco lave cake lived upto its name but I only wish it was a little hot. The chocolate fantasy was amazing. I haven't had a softer and melt in the mouth vegetarian cake like tat before and the cheesecake was definitely one of the best cheesecakes I have tasted so far. The sweetness was just right and it was so light that it made us wanting more. The packaging was amazing and the price dint burn a hole in my pocket!!!"), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  very bad shop.i ordered a big belgian chocolate cake for my husbands birthday and they had given a cake which was a weeks old and not fresh.it charged 700bucks. i would suggest swiggy to take action against these shops'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  I was asked to review this place sometime last month. Ordered the Chocolate Fantasy and the Sicilian Red Velvet.
The delivery was right on time. The delivery guy had no issues with the location. The desserts were served hot. The chocolate fantasy tasted great but the red velvet was okayish.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I am not a big fan of desserts but this place made me to order more and more, I loved the raspberry cheese cake shot alot. The packing was too good, the chocolava was still hot when I got it'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I got a chance to try out their chocolate fantasy and Sicilian red velvet cake. Both of them were amazing, especially the red velvet!

  Ordered the Lava Cake and Strawberry Cheesecake shot from here. The order arrived on time. Was perfectly packed but highly disappointing taste.

The Lava Cake was quite average. Hardly enough chocolate inside and nothing exceptional. The cheesecake shot was nothing like cheesecake. The name is quite deceiving. Also, the strawberry sauce in it tastes like jam. :| I have no clue what Faasos is trying to achieve with this new venture but the quality really really needs to improve for the prices charged because there is no dearth of options for the prices the products are priced at.'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Ordered for a couple of desserts from sweet truth. Delivery was on time and the packing was perfect.

Chocolate fantasy : My mouth started watering the moment I looked at it. The moment I put a spoon in it, I could see liquid chocolate. The cake was slightly undercooked but it still tasted amazing.

Raspberry cheesecake shot : It was cold when I received it and the wrapper said " for immediate consumption". I liked it because it wasn't too sweet. Not a very big fan of cheesecakes but this was not bad for sure.

My favorite: chocolate fantasy.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I have never tasted these things before so it was my first time was quite excited Chocolate ecstasy and sicilian red velvet these both steal the show and now I have ordered around around 3-4 times. I have only one word for these EPIC. The texture the color the taste the moisture everything was epic.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Well, I have tried this on last day of the year 2017. The packaging was really impressive and both are little hot from inside. You actually feel like, it is fresh. Perfectly made by Sweet truth people but was little less in size. I ordered Silicone Red Velvet And Chocolate fantasy, both were good but I personally liked the silicon red velvet more. Great option to order dessert for better mouthwatering taste.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

Great option to order dessert for better mouthwatering taste.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Wanted to try out their products , they usually provide cakes but one can purchase single portions as well. Ordered the Chocolate Fantasy and the Sicilian Red Velvet. 

Was surprised to notice that a Fasos delivery boy came with the product. 

Anyways, the first thing i noticed was both the items were hot. Really hot. Which was great. 

The packaging was good and the cakes themselves were presented in foil cups. 

The chocolate fantasy was like a molten lava cake. Cake-y exterior and a gooey core. Really good taste. 

The Sicilian Red velvet was not a typical red velvet cake, it didn't have the cream cheese, etc. However taste wise it was still good. This too had a gooey core and had a topping of crunchy nuts. 

Overall i think the product was good. Will be happy to try more for occasions in the future.")]

Overall a decent budget place to hangout'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Strolled there on a friday night. Very Close to home- big reason for casual meetups.
The place is reinvented- before it was Jimmy's.
Not much change in structural architecture- although interiors seem a bit mint.
They have a pool table and a foosball table- either of them not up to the mark, but they are free.
The menu is exactly same as the Local's- which is a floor above the bar.
Had a LIIT, a Jim bean and noodles.
LIIT was alright, no complains there.
Food could have been a little bit better, in terms of presentation and taste. Overall its a "your regular friday bar after work to drink and thats it".

Cheerio!'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ok place. Service was slower like crazy. I had to come out of the place twice to check on the order.
Ambience was ok. The chicken dish which ordered sry fr frgetting the name, becoz it wasnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¢Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x80Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x99t worth remembering it. Good benifits wer given so tht was the only good part.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Had a very brief encounter at the gorilla barfare. We visited primarily for drinks and went straight into ordering tequila shots followed by their signature flaming shot 'The Guerilla Flamer'. Service was pretty good and the staff was very courteous. Only thing is that the place was a bit shady for my taste, otherwise everything spot on. We enjoyed Zomato Gold 2+2 drinks offer and ended up spending very nominal amount of 1800 INR for 8 shots. So, definitely the place is worth visiting."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This place is really good to have a wonderful time with value of money and the server jitendra was so good with his skills of taking care of his costumers and beef chilli it was mind blowing see you soon....'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A decent place with good food at a reasonable price. They have zomato gold, hence the total bill is not too much. We ordered 4 drinks and 3 chicken starters and the total bill was around 1700 only. 
The ambience is decent. They have good music playing. We sat in the open, and the waiter there was quite prompt in service. 
A really good place hidden in the busy Koramangala lane. 

Food - 3.5/5
Drinks - 4/5
Service - 5/5
Ambience - 4/5
